channel.title: Veeam Backup & Replication 8 fails when accessing ESXi 6 hosts directly - Failed to login Unknown API version format: "dev" | RobWillis.info

item.title: Veeam Backup & Replication 8 fails when accessing ESXi 6 hosts directly – Failed to login Unknown API version format: “dev”
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.category: Veeam Backup & Replication 8 fails when accessing ESXi 6 hosts directly - Failed to login Unknown API version format: "dev"
item.description:
Veeam Backup & Replication is great tool for when you don’t have vCenter available for whatever reason and you need to move some VMs and/or datastores. It has bailed me out of many sticky situations in the past. However in my most recent bind, I found I absolutely could not get it to connect directly […]

The post Veeam Backup & Replication 8 fails when accessing ESXi 6 hosts directly – Failed to login Unknown API version format: “dev” first appeared on RobWillis.info.
